entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 8:51 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow level 600 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Periods of rain beginning in the evening. Snow level rising to 800 metres overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
